labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: the mic stays open until you press the ptt button after toggling
data.expected_result: it should switch back to PTT without the mic being open when you don't touch the ptt button
data.short_description: switching from PTT to VAD back to PTT whilst talking makes the mic stay open on PTT
data.steps_to_repro: - Setup a keybind to switch between push to talk and voice activation- Start on Push to Talk- Whilst taking switch to Voice Activation using keybind- While you are still talking switch back to Push to Talk
